summary: The diff only updates project_state.json and does not implement the requested PlayPal logo asset changes or the required references/usage updates across the frontend.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the current PlayPal logo assets with the previous-format PlayPal wordmark (blue-to-yellow gradient “PlayPal” text with a single underline) and ensure the updated assets are used everywhere the app references /assets/generated (PWA icons, Apple touch icon, Login screen logo), while keeping the app name as “PlayPal”.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes were made to the actual logo image files under frontend/public/assets/generated, nor to LoginScreen.tsx, PWA metadata (frontend/index.html, frontend/public/manifest.json), or the service worker precache list (frontend/public/service-worker.js). The only modified file is project_state.json.
evidence: project_state.json (only modified file in diff); no evidence of changes to frontend/public/assets/generated/playpal-logo.dim_512x512.png, playpal-logo.dim_192x192.png, playpal-logo.dim_180x180.png; no evidence of changes to frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx; no evidence of changes to frontend/index.html, frontend/public/manifest.json, frontend/public/service-worker.js

hallucinated_features.description: Tracking/flagging a deployment failure and treating the work as a fix request ("Deployment failed" known issue; isFixRequest=true).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists investigating/fixing the prior deployment failure as a non-goal, but the diff adds/retains a known issue about deployment failure and sets isFixRequest to true in project_state.json.
evidence: project_state.json: "known_issues": ["Deployment failed / unable to complete deployment (deployment error)."], "isFixRequest": true
